p: We inferred phylogenies for SIVcpz/HIV-1 gag, pol, and env loci under a relaxed molecular clock in a BMCMC framework ( Figure 1Dâ€“F). There was very high posterior support for monophyly in each of the three HIV-1 lineages as well as for the position of the root. The three loci produced different topologies, which is not surprising given the recombinant history of HIV-1 group N [1], [19].
